name: Monet
text:
[Blocker]
[On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 Character card with 1000 power or less or Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 Character card with 1000 power or less or Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
